ygData.subject: Re: Shadowknight Help.
ygData.msgSnippet: Me tink dat de trolls are better.  I tink de luk better, specially when get de bronze, you shud see me.  De bash better!  We are 3/4 warrior an only 1/4 necro,
ygData.messageBody:
Me tink dat de trolls are better. I tink de luk better, specially when get
de bronze, you shud see me. De bash better! We are 3/4 warrior an only 1/4
necro, yaz needs to bash gud! an we gets the regeneration which you will
find quite gud! Also, our town is just one zone and you can find anyting
easy. Dis is just an opinion of a troll Shadowknight. Make what ya want
wit it.

Grumbel
Xegony
